00026 #ifndef NOISEPP_SCALEPOINT_H
00027 #define NOISEPP_SCALEPOINT_H
00028 
00029 #include "NoisePipeline.h"
00030 #include "NoiseModule.h"
00031 
00032 namespace noisepp
00033 {
00034         class ScalePointElement1D : public PipelineElement1D
00035         {
00036                 private:
00037                         ElementID mElement;
00038                         const PipelineElement1D *mElementPtr;
00039                         Real mScaleX;
00040 
00041                 public:
00042                         ScalePointElement1D (const Pipeline1D *pipe, ElementID element, Real scaleX) :
00043                                 mElement(element), mScaleX(scaleX)
00044                         {
00045                                 mElementPtr = pipe->getElement (mElement);
00046                         }
00047                         virtual Real getValue (Real x, Cache *cache) const
00048                         {
00049                                 return getElementValue (mElementPtr, mElement, x*mScaleX, cache);
00050                         }
00051 
00052         };
00053 
00054         class ScalePointElement2D : public PipelineElement2D
00055         {
00056                 private:
00057                         ElementID mElement;
00058                         const PipelineElement2D *mElementPtr;
00059                         Real mScaleX;
00060                         Real mScaleY;
00061 
00062                 public:
00063                         ScalePointElement2D (const Pipeline2D *pipe, ElementID element, Real scaleX, Real scaleY) :
00064                                 mElement(element), mScaleX(scaleX), mScaleY(scaleY)
00065                         {
00066                                 mElementPtr = pipe->getElement (mElement);
00067                         }
00068                         virtual Real getValue (Real x, Real y, Cache *cache) const
00069                         {
00070                                 return getElementValue (mElementPtr, mElement, x*mScaleX, y*mScaleY, cache);
00071                         }
00072 
00073         };
00074 
00075         class ScalePointElement3D : public PipelineElement3D
00076         {
00077                 private:
00078                         ElementID mElement;
00079                         const PipelineElement3D *mElementPtr;
00080                         Real mScaleX;
00081                         Real mScaleY;
00082                         Real mScaleZ;
00083 
00084                 public:
00085                         ScalePointElement3D (const Pipeline3D *pipe, ElementID element, Real scaleX, Real scaleY, Real scaleZ) :
00086                                 mElement(element), mScaleX(scaleX), mScaleY(scaleY), mScaleZ(scaleZ)
00087                         {
00088                                 mElementPtr = pipe->getElement (mElement);
00089                         }
00090                         virtual Real getValue (Real x, Real y, Real z, Cache *cache) const
00091                         {
00092                                 return getElementValue (mElementPtr, mElement, x*mScaleX, y*mScaleY, z*mScaleZ, cache);
00093                         }
00094 
00095         };
00096 
00100         class ScalePointModule : public Module
00101         {
00102                 private:
00103                         Real mScaleX;
00104                         Real mScaleY;
00105                         Real mScaleZ;
00106 
00107                 public:
00109                         ScalePointModule() : Module(1), mScaleX(1.0), mScaleY(1.0), mScaleZ(1.0)
00110                         {
00111                         }
00113                         void setScaleX (Real v)
00114                         {
00115                                 mScaleX = v;
00116                         }
00118                         Real getScaleX () const
00119                         {
00120                                 return mScaleX;
00121                         }
00123                         void setScaleY (Real v)
00124                         {
00125                                 mScaleY = v;
00126                         }
00128                         Real getScaleY () const
00129                         {
00130                                 return mScaleY;
00131                         }
00133                         void setScaleZ (Real v)
00134                         {
00135                                 mScaleZ = v;
00136                         }
00138                         Real getScaleZ () const
00139                         {
00140                                 return mScaleZ;
00141                         }
00143                         virtual ElementID addToPipeline (Pipeline1D *pipe) const
00144                         {
00145                                 NoiseModuleCheckSourceModules;
00146                                 ElementID first = getSourceModule(0)->addToPipeline(pipe);
00147                                 return pipe->addElement (this, new ScalePointElement1D(pipe, first, mScaleX));
00148                         }
00150                         virtual ElementID addToPipeline (Pipeline2D *pipe) const
00151                         {
00152                                 NoiseModuleCheckSourceModules;
00153                                 ElementID first = getSourceModule(0)->addToPipeline(pipe);
00154                                 return pipe->addElement (this, new ScalePointElement2D(pipe, first, mScaleX, mScaleY));
00155                         }
00157                         virtual ElementID addToPipeline (Pipeline3D *pipe) const
00158                         {
00159                                 NoiseModuleCheckSourceModules;
00160                                 ElementID first = getSourceModule(0)->addToPipeline(pipe);
00161                                 return pipe->addElement (this, new ScalePointElement3D(pipe, first, mScaleX, mScaleY, mScaleZ));
00162                         }
00164                         ModuleTypeId getType() const { return MODULE_SCALEPOINT; }
00165 #if NOISEPP_ENABLE_UTILS
00167                         virtual void write (utils::OutStream &stream) const;
00169                         virtual void read (utils::InStream &stream);
00170 #endif
00171         };
00172 };
00173 
00174 #endif
